all share they get the input from user they update the state whatever the state is and then they take the state and they
draw it that's the thing they do and you go again and again and again how they do that is very very like varied uh and
there's a lot of caveats to this uh getting the input from the user might be different based on game uh updating the
state can be actually pretty complicated you might do partial updates you might offload to a thread you might like do
updates in in multiple steps uh and also drawing can be like you take the state
and you just send it off and you don't care about it and then you're working on the new state so that can also be offloaded so it can be pretty tricky but
to make this a little simpler for our project I picked the uh because it has a
